description:
Pantene 3 Minute Miracle Colour Protection Hair Treatment: Deep Conditionining Treatment for Coloured Hair 180ml

Helps repair 3 months of damage in 3 minutes*. Use Pantene 3 Minute Miracle Daily Treatment with each wash to transform dry, damaged hair into Pantene hair: visibly healthy, shiny and strong^. So you could style, colour, and #daretodoEXTRA.

Recommended for:
Coloured and bleached hair

YOUR IDEAL HAIR: Healthy, moisture-rich soft hair.

PANTENE PRO-V FORMULA INNOVATION: Pantene’s unique shampoo and 3 minute miracle conditioner with Pro-V Formula penetrates into the core, moisturizes, and helps repair damage from root to tip.

Vitamin level tested by the Swiss Vitamin Institute.
name: Pantene Pro-v 3 Minute Miracle Colour Protection Conditioner 180ml
